description: This Dart source file defines the SearchPage widget for a Flutter app, allowing users to search for words and see their dictionary definitions. It includes UI components such as the search bar, results display, and error handling.

classes.name: SearchPage
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that provides the main interface for search functionality, including a search bar and displaying dictionary entries.

classes.name: _SearchPageState
classes.description: State class handling the logic and UI for SearchPage, managing user input, API calls, and display of results.

methods.name: _submit
methods.description: Handles search submission, triggers definition fetch from API, or displays validation error if input is empty.

methods.name: _buildSearchBar
methods.description: Constructs the top search bar widget with input field and submit button.

methods.name: _buildHeader
methods.description: Builds the header widget displaying the title 'Dictionary'.

methods.name: _buildError
methods.description: Builds an error message widget with optional retry action.

methods.name: _buildEntryCard
methods.description: Creates a card widget for displaying a dictionary entry, including word, phonetics, meanings, and examples.

methods.name: _buildResults
methods.description: Displays the search results based on fetched data, including loading, error, or success states.
